tool_description: Analyzes citation text to automatically detect the citation style format (APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, etc.) based on formatting patterns and structural elements.

citation_text.description: The raw citation text to analyze for format detection

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score (0-1) required for format detection

error_messages: Empty citation text: Provide non-empty citation text for analysis.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0 and 1.
Unrecognizable format: Citation format could not be determined with sufficient confidence.
usage: Input a citation string to automatically detect its formatting style. Adjust confidence_threshold to control detection sensitivity.

detected_style.description: The identified citation style (e.g., APA, MLA, Chicago)

style_indicators.description: Key formatting elements that led to the style identification
